title: Interior Photo of Back Porch of Truman House
Scopenote: Nice snapshot of the back porch of the Truman house at 219. N. Delaware, from the inside looking out.  A table, two chairs, a lamp, and plants are visible.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Truman family
Scopenote: Snapshot of (from left to right) Margaret Truman, Senator Harry S. Truman, and Bess W. Truman on a ferry boat. Woman on the extreme left is unidentified. Written in Margaret's handwriting on the back of the photo: "When Dad was still on the Hill - about '38 or '39." Similar to 83-90-13 and 83-90-14.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Press aboard campaign train
Scopenote: View of the press car on the train, showing reporters working at typewriters.  The reporters are traveling with President Harry S. Truman while he is campaigning in the 1948 Presidential campaign.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Bess and Margaret Truman at Blair House
Scopenote: First Lady Bess Wallace Truman and Margaret Truman pose for a picture in the yard at Blair House.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Faded Snapshot of President Harry S. Truman at Blair House
Scopenote: A faded snapshot of President Harry S. Truman slumped in a lawn chair reading a book on the back lawn of the Blair House.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Landry, Graham, Vaughan at lunch, Key West
Scopenote: Dr. Wallace Graham, Robert Landry, and Harry Vaughan at a picnic lunch at the Little White House, Key West, Florida.  Snapshot was probably taken by Margaret Truman.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Bess Truman, Stanley Woodward, and Harry Truman at Key West
Scopenote: First Lady Bess Wallace Truman, Stanley Woodward, and President Harry S. Truman at a picnic lunch at the Little White House, Key West, Florida. Snapshot was probably taken by Margaret Truman.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Bess Truman with others at lunch, Key West
Scopenote: First Lady Bess Wallace Truman and Stanley Woodward seated at a picnic lunch at the Little White House, Key West, Florida.  Snapshots were probably taken by Margaret Truman.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Harry Truman at lunch buffet, Key West
Scopenote: Snapshot of President Harry S. Truman with a plate of food at a picnic lunch at the Little White House, Key West, Florida.  Naval Aide Robert Dennison in background. Snapshots were probably taken by Margaret Truman.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Harry Truman with others at lunch, Key West
Scopenote: Left to right:  Stanley Woodward, President Harry S. Truman, and Robert Dennison at a picnic lunch at the Little White House, Key West, Florida. Snapshots were probably taken by Margaret Truman.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Bess Truman with Harry Vaughan, Key West
Scopenote: Snapshot of First Lady Bess Wallace Truman with Harry Vaughan at a picnic lunch at the Little White House, Key West, Florida.  Snapshot was possibly taken by Margaret Truman.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Harry Truman birthday luncheon
Scopenote: Group seated at birthday luncheon for President Harry S. Truman.  L to R:  James Webb; Bess Truman; Charles Murphy; unidentified woman; Harry Vaughan.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Harry S. Truman at birthday Luncheon
Scopenote: Snapshot of Harry Truman with his cake at a birthday luncheon.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Harry S. Truman birthday luncheon
Scopenote: Snapshot of President Harry S. Truman at a birthday luncheon.  L to R:  Two unidentified women; unidentified man in glasses; George Elsey (top of eyes visible); three unidentified people; William Hopkins; unidentified woman; William Hassett; unidentified woman; President Harry S. Truman; unidentified woman; Matthew Connelly; unidentified woman.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Harry Truman birthday luncheon
Scopenote: Group seated for a birthday luncheon for President Harry S. Truman.  L to R:  Charles Ross; unidentified woman; James Webb; Bess Truman; Charles Murphy; unidentified woman; Harry Vaughan.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Harry Truman Birthday Luncheon
Scopenote: Dark snapshot of people attending the birthday luncheon for President Harry S. Truman.  People are unidentified. Matthew Connelly (left); Margaret Truman at far end of table.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Snapshot of Grape Arbor and Backyard of Truman Home
Scopenote: Polaroid snapshot of the grape arbor, part of the back porch, and part of the backyard of the Truman home at 219 N. Delaware in Independence, Missouri.
Related Collection: Margaret Truman & E. Clifton Daniel Papers

title: Snapshot of Back Porch of Truman Home
Scopenote: Polaroid snapshot of the back porch of the Truman home at 219 N. Delaware in Independence, Missouri.

title: Margaret Truman in White House Family Quarters
Scopenote: Margaret Truman poses in the kitchen area of the White House Family Quarters.  She is posing for a series of photographs in the White House for Look Magazine.

Scopenote: Margaret Truman poses beneath a portrait in the Yellow Oval Room of the White House.  She is posing for several photos in the White House for Look Magazine.

title: Margaret Truman and Clifton Daniel Attend Reception
Scopenote: Margaret Truman and her husband, Clifton Daniel, in evening clothes attending an unidentified reception at an unidentified location.

Scopenote: Margaret Truman poses in the entrance to the Red Room of the White House, where she stands under the official White House portrait of her father, President Harry S. Truman (by Greta Kempton).  She is posing for a series of photos at the White House for Look Magazine.
